mods.abstract: $100 RewardRANAWAY from the subscriber, living at Grand Bluff, Panola county, Texas, on Thursday night last, TWO NEGRO MEN, GLASBOW and ISAACGlasgow is about 6 feet high, 20 years of age, yellow complexion, stout built, weighs about 165, thin, short whiskers, and has a small scar on one shoulderIsaac is about 5 feet 8 or 10 inches high, 20 years of age, dark complexion, stout built, weighs about 160 poundsWhen they left had on dark blue satinst pants and coats, and calico shirtsI will pay fifty dollars for each of them delivered to me at my residence or twenty-five dollars for each delievered in jail where I can get themDAVID MVAWTERGrand Bluff, Panola c'ty, Texas, April 18, 1859.
mods.note: Louisiana State University Libraries, Special Collections ( http://www.lib.lsu.edu/special )
mods.accessCondition: E-mail lsudiglib@lsu.edu with questions or comments about the collection.

Physical rights are retained by the LSU LibrariesCopyright has expired and the item is therefore in the public domainPermission to reproduce this image must be requested through the Special Collections Department, Louisiana State University Libraries.
mods.note: Louisiana Runaway Slave Advertisements, 1836-1865, Louisiana Digital Library, Baton Rouge, La.
